question: [File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-rosetta/src/test/mod.rs] [Function: test_fa_transfer_other_currency()] [Fee currency mismatch] The fee operation at line 455 uses native_coin() while transfer uses OTHER_CURRENCY - can this dual-currency handling be exploited to pay fees in worthless tokens?
